org.gvsig.bingmaps.lib.api

Interface BingMapsManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultBingMapsManager

    public interface BingMapsManager
    This class is responsible of the management of the library's business logic. It is the library's main entry point, and provides all the services to manage it
